definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: awe-inspiring, terror-striking;—´[[ע]] of ´[[י]], [[כְּגִבּוֹר עָרִיץ]] Je 20:11; pl. as subst. [[עָרִיחִים]], in bad sense of formidable adversaries, personal, Je 15:21 (‖[[רָעִים]]), Job 6:23 (‖[[חָר]]), and national, Ps 54:5 (‖[[זׇרִים]]), = ´[[עֲדַת ע]] Ps 86:14 (‖[[זֵדִים]]), ´[[הֲמוֹן ע]] Is 29:5 (‖[[זׇרָָיִח]]); esp. of Chaldeans Is 13:11, cstr. [[עָרִחֵי גוֹיִם]] most terrifying of the nations Ez Eze 28:7 (‖[[זׇרִים]]) Eze 30:11, Eze 31:12 (‖[[זׇרִים]]), Eze 32:12; so (prob.) sg. [[עָרִיץ]] Is 49:25 (rd. ´[[ע]] also for [[חַדִּיק]] v:Is 49:24, so Lo Ew Che Gr al.); without specif. ref. [[גּוֹיִם עָרִיחִים]] Is 25:3 awe-inspiring nations (Du Che take ´[[ע]] as subst.), ´[[רִוּחַ ע]] v:Is 25:4 (del. as gloss Di al.), ´[[זְמִיר ע]] v:Is 25:5 (del. verse as gloss Du Che); late, of wicked in gen., as ruthless ´[[רָאִיתִי רָשָׁע ע]] Ps 37:35 I have seen a wicked man ruthless; as subst., Is 29:20 (‖[[לֵץ]]), Job 15:20 (‖[[רשׁע]]), pl. Job 27:13 (‖ id.), Pr 11:16; rd. also ([[ים]])[[עָרִיחִ]] Is 11:4 (for MT [[אֶרֶץ]]), so Che Br:MP Du Gr al. (‖[[רָשָׁע]]).
